verse: स वा अयं पुरुषो जायमानः शरीरमभिसम्पद्यमानः पाप्मभिः ससृज्यते स उत्क्रामन्म्रियमाणः पाप्मनो विजहाति॥
meaning: Meaning: This verse describes the cycle of birth and death. The person, upon being born, acquires a body and is simultaneously burdened with sins. However, upon death, he gets rid of these accumulated sins.
